Class GUIView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientStateVisitor, ClientView
public class GUIView extends javafx.application.Application implements ClientView
GUI implementation of ClientView.
